list.name: Changes
list.comment: #fix #jsx Updated the web name input field and added validation error handling for entering a web name in the form. Refactored form elements, added state checks and handling to improve user experience and prevent errors, updated elements for heavy registration style, and implemented status selection on the form.

task.summary: #fix #jsx Add new configuration routes and menu items for company information, payment integration, security policies, and zip code, update workspace XML file and project settings.

#fix #jsx A refactoring component that includes a new email template module and pagination functionality, updates to communications, ticket routing and menu items, and customization of project settings in the workspace XML.

#fix #jsx #npm Added new expense and finance components, updated imports in index.jsx, changed text for clarity, and added new paths and elements to menu items and package files, adding dependencies and peer dependencies for react-apexcharts and apexcharts, and new modules for functionality SVG. Updated workspace and project settings XML file, added new configuration routes and menu items for company information, payment integration, security policies and zip code.
#fix #js #json Update database with new instructor and location information, as well as student, classes, schools, and vehicles data. Fix workspace references and properties component settings.

#fix #jsx #git Updated database fields and variable names in chart and index components. Updated the database with new instructor and location information, as well as student, class, school, and vehicle information. Corrected workspace links and property component settings.

#fix #jsx #svg #styles Updated default and hover calendar background colors to use dynamic values ​​from ColorObject, adjusted SVG icon size, refined secondary color opacity, added new color variables, changed content styling in registration module, customized form module. Added form field handlers and updated the input style in the registration form.
#fix #jsx Updated form elements to dynamically include custom class names based on the props provided.
#fix #jsx Implemented a feature to export student data and improved filtering options in the student event log view. Refactored form elements and checkboxes in UI components.
#fix #jsx Implemented a feature for exporting student data and improved filtering options in the student event log view, as well as refactored form elements and checkboxes in UI components.
#fix #jsx Implemented new navigation links for the Payment Log Report and Classroom Details, added components for PaymentLogReport and ClassroomInfoDetails, and updated the import links accordingly.
#fix #jsx #styles Refactor navbar to dynamically manage open keys and update menu item styles. - Update component properties in workspace.xml and navbar.jsx.
#fix #jsx Updated file and router import and routing paths, commented out unused components, and adjusted the use of NavLink to improve navigation consistency.

#fix #jsx Updated components to use TableComponent instead of Table from antd and made necessary changes to display data correctly and improve styling. Refactored file display. Refactored the alignment and style in the rendering methods of the HighSchoolData component.

#fix #jsx Updated component styles to use a constant 50px height to improve UI consistency. Components have been refactored to use TableComponent instead of Table from antd, data display and styling has been improved; aligned and styled rendering methods in the HighSchoolData component.

#fix #jsx Refactored form elements and added state validation and handling for better user experience and error prevention. Updated form elements for heavy registration style and implement status selection on form.

#fix #jsx Updated the web name input field and added validation error handling for entering a web name in the form. Refactored form elements, added state checks and handling to improve user experience and prevent errors, updated elements for heavy registration style, and implemented status selection on the form.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - Update form elements and switch components styles for better user interaction and experience. - Refactored form elements and added validation and state handling for better user interaction and error prevention; updated elements for heavy registration style and implemented status selection on the form.
